name: The Uncured
description:
A short horror game about you and your friend Jeffrey exploring the abandoned "Golden Valley Hospital" Where you once made an unforgivable mistake. The dead souls you have left behind will come to haunt you. You must get past obstacles and rediscover the dark past of the hospital. Jeffrey will guide you through the hospital with the radio. (He won't be much help.) Good luck.

Credits: 

You can find the amazing team that also made this project at the PlayCanvas page: https://playcanvas.com/project/976879/overview/the-uncured

Chase Music: Right Behind You By: David Robson Link: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/download/right-behind-you/286...

Background Ambiance: A Really Dark Alley Link: https://www.chosic.com/download-audio/25499/

Keep in mind this is my first released game so if you find any bugs or have suggestions please let me know : )
